destiny.core

Class ScreenManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • destiny.core.ScreenManager

  • public class ScreenManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all the screens in the game and decides which one should be drawn and when
    Version:
    12/5/2020
    Author:
    Nathaniel

    • Method Detail

      • addScreen

        public static void addScreen(java.lang.String key,
                             Screen s)
        Add a Screen to the ScreenManager
        Parameters:
        key - The key that the screen should be stored with
        s - The screen that should be placed with that key

      • setScreen

        public static void setScreen(java.lang.String key,
                             Screen s,
                             processing.core.PApplet window)
        Set the screen to the given screen given a screen object and key
        Parameters:
        key - The desired screen's name
        s - The Screen object
        window - The window that the screen should be drawn on

      • drawCurrentScreen

        public static void drawCurrentScreen(processing.core.PApplet window)
        Draws the screen that is selected
        Parameters:
        window - The PApplet that the screen should be drawn to
        Postcondition:
        Has the screen drawn to the PApplet

      • setCurrentScreenByName

                                          processing.core.PApplet window)
        Set the screen with the given screen name
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the screen
        window - The window that the screen should be drawn to
